body: I found the mangaka in instagram, and this was pretty good

Man I must be fucking autistic or something lmao after the first story finished I thought the rest of them were continuations and I was like why is it only about the girl in the beginning, what happened to the guy she lost her virginity to? Turns out my spedfuck brain didn’t even read that they had completely different names and each volume is about a new couple. The girl in the first story is Azumi, and the next story is about a completely different couple with a girl named Nanako. And it changes to a different girl every chapter. Wow it looks like there’s even a page after the fucking cover that shows all the different girls featured in each respective chapter/volume. I should really consider offing myself that was the most obvious shit and I still got confused like a retard.
Thank you to the dude from hanime that give me this gem. Such a classic.
dang first good bye bitter sweet. i hate those.
Another day, another gem found. Such sweetness
why the rape tag? if i wasn't specifically looking for this, i wouldn't have seen it for the blacklist
